resources.string: This app functions as a receiver for sms commands. So you can control this phone by sending simple control messages. (e.g. rc enable hotspot) \nLets see how this works.

The receiver is listening for incoming text messages and executes the received commands. It can be started and stopped manually by clicking the right button. \nIn order to start the receiver after boot, set the respective option in settings.

The control functions are grouped into modules. Each module contains one or multiple commands. (e.g. enable hotspot, disable hotspot) Incompatible modules are marked with a red minus symbol and cannot be enabled.
Make configurations, inspect the receivers history and check for dangerous behaviour. \n\nNow learn how to control a phone.
enable module, which contains the required functionality
add granted phones to module, from which you send the command messages
make sure that the receiver is running
create text message with correct syntax (see bottom)
Example:\nrc enable hotspot; enable mobile data
